longBusinessSummary: Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of construction and agricultural machinery in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates through Construction Machinery, Agricultural Machinery, and Financial Services segments. It offers concrete machineries, including truck and trailer mounted concrete pumps, dry mortar products, concrete placing booms, concrete mixing plants, truck-mounted concrete mixers, truck-mounted line concrete pumps, and self-propelled boom concrete pumps; and truck, all-terrain truck, and crawler cranes, as well as various tower cranes. The company also provides road construction and pile foundation machineries, earth working machineries, material handling machineries and systems, specialized vehicles, and vehicle axles; road building and maintenance machineries; hoisting machineries; and forklift trucks and other products for infrastructure and real estate construction. In addition, it offers various agricultural machineries, such as tractors, grain harvesters, and drying machines. Further, it provides finance leasing, commercial factoring, and bond issuance services. Additionally, the company leases and trades in equipment and machineries; researches and manufactures machine software; manages tourism resource; and offers hydraulic products. The company was formerly known as Changsha Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2011. Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.
longName: Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
